patch.author: jostrick <jostrick@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: withViewport: Preserving the `forceUpdate` parameter when asynchronously re-resolving the viewport size.

patch.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: Updating setRTL to write isRTL to local storage. This allows the setting to persist across sessions.

minor.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
minor.comment: Adding warn utilities for console logging warnings on misuse.

minor.author: Christopher Schleiden <cschleiden@live.de>
minor.comment: overflow: Utilities for detecting overflow in elements

minor.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
minor.comment: BaseComponent: added support for resolving `componentRef` automatically. Also added `_warnDeprecations` and `_warnMutualExclusion` helpers for warning on misuse.

minor.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
minor.comment: Adding `setBodyScroll` method to enable/disable body scrolling. Useful for Overlay scenarios where you would want to disable the scrolling behind the overlay.

minor.author: Johanna Hawkins <jo.hawkins@hotmail.com>
minor.comment: Adding some utility functions to handle date range calculations and determining if a date falls within a date range.

minor.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
minor.comment: Adjusting React peer dependency to i

patch.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: Updating package.json dependencies to exclude typings packages.

patch.author: Christopher Schleiden <cschleiden@live.de>
patch.comment: autobind: Does not re-bind every time a decorated method is accessed anymore.

patch.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: rtl utility should read rtl attribute on first read.

major.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
major.comment: Introducing a new package to contain all baseline utilities that are commonly used amongst Fabric components.
